author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Backport 3 PR's #33735, #33788 and #33840 to remove overlaps for preshower using assemblies

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflow 11634.911

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport #33735, #33788 and #33840 which are integrated with the master branch
title: Run3-gex75 Backport 3 PR's to remove overlaps for preshower using assemblies
